SELECT R.* FROM ( SELECT
FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$+1) AS PAGE
FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$+1) AS PAGE
FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY A.VIEW_CNT DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$+1) AS PAGE
, A.* FROM ( SELECT a.SEQ , a.TITLE , TO_CHAR(a.REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') REG_DATE , a.CREATED_DATE , a.MODIFIED_DATE , a.ISSUED_DATE , a.DIGITALIZED_DATE , a.PUBLISHER , a.TYPE , a.PERIOD , a.UCI , a.URL , a.CONTEXT_NAME , a.INSERT_DATE , a.CREATOR , DECODE ( APPROVAL , 'Y' , '승인' , 'N' , '미승인' , '대기') AS APPROVAL , a.SUBJECT_CATEGORY , a.LOCATION , a.VIEW_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(SEQ) FROM PORTAL_COMMENT WHERE MENU_CD IN ('1', '2') AND MENU_SEQ = a.SEQ) REPLY_CNT, SUBSTR(PERIOD, INSTR('~'||PERIOD,'~',1,1), INSTR(PERIOD||'~','~',1,1)-INSTR('~'||PERIOD,'~',1,1)) reg_start, SUBSTR(PERIOD, INSTR('~'||PERIOD,'~',1,2), INSTR(PERIOD||'~','~',1,2)-INSTR('~'||PERIOD,'~',1,2)) reg_end , DECODE( a.GENRE , '1' , '축제' , 2 , '행사' , a.GENRE) GENRE FROM PCN_RDF_METADATA a WHERE
reg_date <= sysdate
a.GENRE = #genre#
( title like '%'|| #keyword# || '%' or DBMS_LOB.INSTR(DESCRIPTION,#keyword#) > 0 )
title like '%'|| #keyword# || '%'
DBMS_LOB.INSTR(DESCRIPTION,#keyword#) > 0
creator like '%'|| #keyword# || '%'
'%'||#type[]#||'%'
A.PUBLISHER = #office#
A.REG_DATE > TO_DATE(#search_start#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
A.REG_DATE < TO_DATE('$search_end$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
APPROVAL = #approval#
) A
( TO_DATE(reg_start,'yyyy.mm.dd') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start#,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('$reg_end$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') OR TO_DATE(reg_end,'yyyy.mm.dd') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start#,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('$reg_end$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') )
) R WHERE R.PAGE = #page_no#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT a.TITLE , a.REG_DATE , a.CREATED_DATE , a.MODIFIED_DATE , a.ISSUED_DATE , a.DIGITALIZED_DATE , a.PUBLISHER , a.TYPE , a.PERIOD , a.UCI , a.URL , a.CONTEXT_NAME , a.INSERT_DATE , a.CREATOR , a.APPROVAL , a.SUBJECT_CATEGORY , a.LOCATION , a.view_cnt, SUBSTR(PERIOD, INSTR('~'||PERIOD,'~',1,1), INSTR(PERIOD||'~','~',1,1)-INSTR('~'||PERIOD,'~',1,1)) reg_start, SUBSTR(PERIOD, INSTR('~'||PERIOD,'~',1,2), INSTR(PERIOD||'~','~',1,2)-INSTR('~'||PERIOD,'~',1,2)) reg_end , ( SELECT name FROM PCN_COMMON_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'GENRE' AND PCODE = 127 AND value= a.GENRE ) GENRE FROM PCN_RDF_METADATA a WHERE
reg_date <= sysdate
( title like '%'|| #keyword# || '%' or DBMS_LOB.INSTR(DESCRIPTION,#keyword#) > 0 )
title like '%'|| #keyword# || '%'
DBMS_LOB.INSTR(DESCRIPTION,#keyword#) > 0
creator like '%'|| #keyword# || '%'
'%'||#type[]#||'%'
A.PUBLISHER = #office#
A.REG_DATE > TO_DATE(#search_start#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
A.REG_DATE < TO_DATE('$search_end$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
APPROVAL = #approval#
) A
( TO_DATE(reg_start,'yyyy.mm.dd') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start#,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('$reg_end$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') OR TO_DATE(reg_end,'yyyy.mm.dd') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start#,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('$reg_end$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') )

SELECT A.UCI , A.SEQ , A.CREATOR , A.REG_DATE , A.TITLE , A.REFERENCE_IDENTIFIER , A.PERIOD , A.LOCATION , A.VENUE , A.HOME_PAGE , A.REFERENCE , A.DESCRIPTION , A.URL , A.INSERT_DATE , A.RIGHTS , A.REQUEST , A.ZIP_CODE , A.ADDR1 , A.ADDR2 , A.ZIP_YN , A.TOP_YN , A.REFERENCE_IDENTIFIER_ORG , A.APPROVAL , SUBSTR(PERIOD, INSTR('~'||PERIOD,'~',1,1), INSTR(PERIOD||'~','~',1,1)-INSTR('~'||PERIOD,'~',1,1)) REG_START , SUBSTR(PERIOD, INSTR('~'||PERIOD,'~',1,2), INSTR(PERIOD||'~','~',1,2)-INSTR('~'||PERIOD,'~',1,2)) REG_END , A.NOTE1 , A.GENRE , A.REQUEST , A.MDESCRIPTION , WEB_ACCESSIBILITY_FILE , WEB_ACCESSIBILITY_FILE_ORG ,TIME , use_trgt, use_fee, grade, support, prfcast, etc_desc, styurl1, styurl2, styurl3, styurl4 FROM PCN_RDF_METADATA A WHERE UCI = #uci#
